statements: SELECT * FROM Messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT message_text FROM Messages WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT teacher_id, message_text FROM Messages WHERE teacher_id = 3 ORDER BY message_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Messages WHERE teacher_id = 2 AND student_id = 5
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) as total_messages FROM Messages GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_messages > 1
SELECT * FROM Messages WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM Messages WHERE teacher_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, student_id, message_text FROM Messages WHERE teacher_id = 789 AND student_id = 321;
SELECT * FROM Messages WHERE student_id = 987 OR teacher_id = 654 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT student_id, teacher_id, COUNT(message_id) AS message_count FROM Messages GROUP BY student_id, teacher_id HAVING message_count > 3;
